item.title: 'DSS Recovers 18 Bags Of Currency, Documents From Emefieles Residence'
item.description: Department of State Services (DSS) operatives confiscated 18 bags, known as “Ghana-must-go” bags, filled with money and documents from the home of the suspended governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), Godwin Emefiele. A source that spoke with Nigeria Tribune revealed that the bags were seized from Emefiele’s Lagos residence following a full day of property searching on Friday. Emefiele, arrested on June 10, has been in DSS custody for eight days.

item.title: After Fall Out With Peter Obi's LP, NNPP Throws Open Alliance Talks
item.description: The New Nigeria Peoples Party (NNPP) has revealed that its presidential candidate, Rabi’u Musa Kwankwaso, is still willing to go into alliance with any political party for the 2023 general election. The National Chairman of the NNPP, Prof. Rufa’I Alkali, disclosed this at a press conference in Lagos on Wednesday. Naija News recalls that the party had failed to secure a merger with Peter Obi’s Labour Party due to diverging views on who would become the presidential candidate.

item.title: Afunanya Alleges Planned Smear Campaign Against DSS

Afunanya, who made the claim in a terse statement issued in Abuja, did not however reveal the identities of those behind the alleged negative move that seeks to put the nation’s elite security body in a bad public light.

item.title: Be Responsible, Reveal Those Behind Attack On Odili Residence

Naija News recalls her Maitama, Abuja residence was invaded by security operatives on Friday, 29th October and no one has so far officially claimed responsibility for the raid but the EFCC as well as the Minister of Justice, Abubakar Malami have since denied any involvement.

item.description: - Karoti Girls’ High School staffroom became a battlefield as two male teachers confronted each other in a fight over a young female colleague - The bitter rivalry over the woman took an ugly turn when the other teacher reached for a panga and allegedly slashed his colleague in the head, arms and fingers - The officer commanding Mwea East police division confirmed the incident, which left the school community in utter shock

item.title: L Joe - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Rapper most famous as a member of the South Korean boy band Teen Top. He and the band are known for releases like 2013's Teen Top Class and 2015's Natural Born Teen Top, both of which topped the South Korean music charts. Before Fame He lived in California from ages 12 through 17. He was invited to join Teen Top after participating in an open Lotte World audition. Trivia He has appeared as an actor on episodes of the television dramas Flower Grandpa Investigation Unit and Missing Noir M.

item.title: Maraga Succession: Martha Koome Says Married Partners Aren't Entitled to Each Other's Premarital Pro
item.description: - Justice Martha Koome said no partner should lay a claim to a property that was developed before marriage - She explained either party in the marriage acquires occupational rights only in the event that they stay together - Koome observed that the law corresponds with patriarchal dominance since the laws are made in male-dominated parliaments ATTENTION: Don't miss trending Kenyan news. Follow TUKO.co.ke on Twitter! The Court of Appeal judge Martha Koome has maintained marriage does not entitle one to premarital property.

item.title: Mwanamuziki prezzo atamani kurudiana na mpenzi wake walioachana miaka 10 iliyopita
item.description: - Mwimbaji maarufu,CMB Prezzo amekiri kwamba bado anampenda mpenzi wake wa zamani,Sheila Mwanigha - Hii ni baada ya Prezzo kutofautiana vikali na mpenzi wake wa sasa,Michelle Yola Mwanamuziki tajika Prezo ama kwa majina yake kamili Jackson Ndechu Makini amezingua mitandao ya kijamii kwa mara nyingine baada ya kutofautiana vikali na mpenzi wake Michell Yola. Prezzo sasa amekiri kwamba bado anampenda mpenzi wake wa zamani na angependa warudishe uhusiano wa kimapenzi walokuwa nao miaka kumi iliyopita.

item.title: Nathan Parsons - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Actor who starred as Ethan Lovett on the hit daytime drama General Hospital. He has also appeared in the series True Blood and The Originals. He had a supporting role in the 2007 horror comedy Teeth. Before Fame He moved to Los Angeles after being accepted into the BFA acting program at the University of Southern California. Trivia He had a recurring role on the ABC Family series, Bunheads, about a dance school. Family Life He was born in South Australia, but raised in Colorado and Texas.

item.title: October 31 Horoscope and Zodiac
item.description: Ambitious, intelligent and understanding, your natural abilities are well-suited for numerous careers. You may find passion in helping others, which could lead to a career in philanthropy, counseling or education. Similarly, your ambition may be a good fit for the world of business, media or advertising. If the world of entertainment calls you, a career in directing or acting may be rewarding, which was the case for Peter Jackson, who was also born on October 31st.

item.title: Osinbajo, Tinubu On Collision Over Muslim-Muslim Ticket
item.description: The Vice-President of Nigeria, Yemi Osinbajo has reportedly expressed his displeasure about the Muslim-Muslim ticket of the All Progressives Congress in the 2023 presidential election. Recall that the party’s presidential candidate, Bola Tinubu announced the former Governor of Borno State, Kashim Shettima as his running mate despite calls against the Muslim/Muslim tickets. A Presidency source that spoke on the trending issue on Monday claimed that Osinbajo has expressed his objection to the Muslim-Muslim ticket.

item.title: Seneta wa Marekani aliyepinga mswada wa kufadhili coronavirus akamata virusi
item.description: - Seneta Paul Rand alikuwa miongoni mwa wabunge ambao walipiga kura dhidi ya mswada wa kutenga KSh 10.6 trilioni ya kukabiliana na virusi vya corona - Alipatwa na virusi hivyo baada ya kuhudhuria hafla ya hadhara Louisville, watu wengine kadhaa ambao pia walihudhuria hafla hiyo wameambukizwa - Baadhi ya maseneta ambao walitangamana naye pia wameingia karantini ya kibinafsi huku wakisubiri matokeo Seneta mmoja nchini Marekani ambaye alipiga kura dhidi ya mswada wa kutenga fedha ya kukabiliana na virusi vya corona amethibitishwa kuwa na COVID-19.

item.title: Taylor Swift Has Made a Statement to Address Fans Who Are Mad About the Ticketmaster Fiasco
item.description: Why is everyone mad at Taylor Swift? The singer has been caught up in a whirlwind of controversy ever since her tour tickets went on sale. Source: Getty ImagesIt is quite a tumultuous time to be a Taylor Swift fan, to say the very least. Although the release of her latest critically-acclaimed project "Midnights" offers everything listeners hoped it would, events that have followed its rollout have been the definition of a mess.

item.title: Top 10 must watch Hollywood movies to add to your watchlist
item.description: What would your life be like without movies? For most of us, films are just a form of entertainment whenever we are free. We tend to overlook the fact that they have a lasting impact on our lives. From the must watch Hollywood movies, we learn new things and also gain a deeper understanding of human feelings and emotions. Initially, Hollywood movies referred to films that were produced within the geographical location of Hollywood in the United States of America.

item.title: Why did Sinad O'Connor tear up a picture of the Pope?
item.description: There Is More to the Story Behind Sinéad O'Connor Tearing up a Photo of the Pope on 'SNL'By Jennifer TisdaleJul. 26 2023, Updated 4:23 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesSinéad O'Connor When Sinéad O'Connor was the musical on Saturday Night Live on Oct. 3, 1992, she was only 26 years-old. The Irish singer had released two albums, 1987's The Lion and the Cobra as well as 1990's I Do Not Want What I Haven't Got.
